alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 2:42PM CDT until July 14 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 242 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Cambria, or 7 miles east of Salina, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salina, Gypsum, New Cambria and Kipp. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 84 and 92. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 253 and 266. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
